name: Eugene's Dream: The Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World (Ballistic Machine)
name_original: Eugene's Dream: The Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World (Ballistic Machine)
description:
So what is Eugene's dream? A brand new cleaning product? A type of pink car dice perhaps? No, you idiot. It's a new video game featuring everyone's favourite tie wearing robot with a boring 9 to 5 job; Eugene. Eugene is just your average cleaning robot on a spaceship, but that's all about to change when a workplace accident causes him to be sucked out of an airlock. Thrown into a world of madness, Eugene will do whatever it takes to make it back home...

Take control of Eugene as he tries to navigate this insane world, which way will lead him home safely and which way will lead to a DEAD end? With Branching paths and many situations to play through getting home safe is harder than it might seem

It's wacky fun designed to annoy the player and prevent them from reaching their goal of getting our hero back home! This game benefits from re-playing with different choices.
